name: Timefight Zone
summary: Timefight Zone is a Co-Op FPS that is best described as a mix of Left 4 Dead, Timesplitters, and Serious Sam. It's still very early in development, and you can see exactly how early by checking out our development videos!

videos.name: Gameplay video
videos.title: Timefight Zone Pre-Alpha Preview #4 - Complete Visual Overhaul
